document_data.name: Sshansalue Wonderharp
document_data.mainbody: '''Sshansalue Wonderharp''' was a [[half-elf]] minstrel and [[adventurer]] of [[the Vast]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/55/The Everwinking Eye: A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye|24}}
document_data.Description: She was beautiful and tall, and commonly clad in black [[leather armor]].
document_data.Reputation: She was one of the more well-known itinerant minstrels wandering the Vast, and was hailed as an old friend in the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]].
